text: Beware of the Car () is a 1966 Soviet comedy-drama movie directed by Eldar Ryazanov.«Мы будем нещадно бороться с лицами, живущих на нетрудовые доходы!»: на сахалинский экран возвращается киноклассикаБЕРЕГИСЬ АВТОМОБИЛЯ (1966) It stars Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Oleg Yefremov, and Lyubov Dobrzhanskaya. ==Actors== * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as Yuri Detochkin * Oleg Yefremov as Maksim Podberyozovikov * Lyubov Dobrzhanskaya as Detochkin's mother * Olga Aroseva as Lyuba * Andrei Mironov as Dima Semitsvetov * Anatoli Papanov as Semyon Vasilyevich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1966 comedy- drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Eldar Ryazanov
title: Beware of the Car
